title: About Milvus Bootcamp
description: Milvus bootcamps are designed to expose users to both the simplicity and depth of the vector database. Discover how to run benchmark tests as well as build similarity search applications spanning chatbots, recommendation systems, reverse image search, molecular search, and much more.

content.title: Distributed deployment with Mishards
content.desc: Build a Milvus cluster using Mishards, a sharding middleware.

content.title: Distributing Mishards with Kubernetes
content.desc: Install shared storage and build a Milvus cluster with Mishards, a sharding middleware, using both Helm and Kubectl.

content.title: Milvus cloud NFS using JuiceFS
content.desc: Enable Milvus nodes to share data using JuiceFS, a standard POSIX file system interface.

content.title: Highly available Milvus using keepalived
content.desc: Deploy a highly available Milvus distribution using Keepalived.

content.title: Load balanced Milvus using nginx
content.desc: Deploy a load balanced Milvus distribution using NGINX, which can distribute requests to multiple server nodes.

content.title: Milvus in Google Colaboratory
content.desc: Set up Milvus in Google Colab, a free Jupyter notebook environment that runs entirely in the cloud and is especially well suited to machine learning and data analysis.

content.title: Image Similarity Search
content.desc: Build a reverse image search system using Milvus paired with YOLOv3 for object detection and ResNet-50 for feature extraction.

content.title: Question Answering System
content.desc: Build an intelligent chatbot using Milvus and the BERT model for natural language processing (NLP).

content.title: Recommendation System
content.desc: Build an AI-powered movie recommendation system using Milvus paired with PaddlePaddleâ€™s deep learning framework.

content.title: Video Similarity Search
content.desc: Build a video similarity search engine using Milvus and a VGG neural network.

content.title: Audio Similarity Search
content.desc: Build an audio search engine using Milvus paired with PANNs for audio pattern recognition.

content.title: Molecular Similarity Search
content.desc: Build a molecule similarity search system using Milvus paired with RDkit for cheminformatics.

content.title: Hybrid Search
content.desc: Make vector similarity search more granular using Milvus and PostgresQL for scalar field filtering.

content.title: Milvus and ONNX
content.desc: Build a reverse image search system with Milvus using various AI models in collaboration with the Open Neural Network Exchange (ONNX).
